analysis.description:
airDrop.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol#410-422) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol#418-419)

airDrop.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol#422-430) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(_from,_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol)

airDrop.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,_value) (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol)

airDrop.withdrawToken (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_token).transfer(owner,_value) (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol)

airDrop.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol#418-419)

airDrop.transferFrom has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(_from,_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_contracts/0xdfa581bd208810400b19ce1ff033ee102c9f47b9.sol)
